settings.custom_css: selector .dlicon.design_wand-11 {n    font-size: 0 !important;n    background: url(https://i2.wp.com/draven.la-studioweb.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/m1-icon-wand2@2x.png);n    background-repeat: no-repeat;n    background-size: contain;n    width: 100%;n    height: 100%;n    background-position: center;n}nselector .dlicon.ui-1_analytics-88 {n    font-size: 0 !important;n    background: url(https://i2.wp.com/draven.la-studioweb.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/m1-icon-analytics@2x.png);n    background-repeat: no-repeat;n    background-size: contain;n    width: 100%;n    height: 100%;n    background-position: center;n}nselector .dlicon.design_responsive {n    font-size: 0 !important;n    background: url(https://i2.wp.com/draven.la-studioweb.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/m1-icon-responsive@2x.png);n    background-repeat: no-repeat;n    background-size: contain;n    width: 100%;n    height: 100%;n    background-position: center;n}nnselector .lastudio-services__button:before {n    content: '';n    position: absolute;n    left: 0;n    bottom: 0;n    right: 0;n    top: -70%;n}nselector .lastudio-services__inner{n    overflow: hidden;n    position: relative;n}nselector .lastudio-services__inner:before {n    content: '';n    background: inherit;n    transition: all 2s;n    position: absolute;n    left: 0;n    top: 0;n    right: 0;n    bottom: 0;n    transform: scale(1);n}nselector .lastudio-services__inner:hover:before {n    transform: scale(1.2);n}

item_list.item_comment: Customer Support has been awesome! I'm somewhat of a beginner when it comes to Word Press, and they've helped me set up and answer questions. Very responsive, and I'm very grateful for their Customer Support Team! 5 Stars all the way!
